content:
A Customer Story is a history of events for an Account or a Contact. Customer stories are driven by metadata configuration, displaying a timeline of all interactions with the customer in a single, chronological feed.

Add a Customer Story to a page with the story-slds component or as a Visualforce component to display a timeline of all interactions with a customer in a single, chronological feed.

Configure the Objects Displayed in a Customer Story

* Add new object configurations for the Opportunity object.
* Remove any preconfigured objects from the Customer Story.

Modify the Story List Page Limit
Set the number of records displayed on your Customer Story by updating the pageSize parameter or using the custom setting Story List Page Limit.

Add or Modify a Customer Story Icon
Each story object type has an associated icon that appears next to the title of the story item, automatically retrieved based on the object type.
title: Configuring and Customizing Vlocity Customer Story
